title: GraalVM (Finally) Gets Java for WebAssembly
author: B Cameron Gain
description: Up until now, Java has been neglected, as WebAssembly modules have been more conducive with C and C++, Rust and Go, and now even Python is embedded as an interpreter.
cntitle: GraalVM（最终）获得了用于 WebAssembly 的 Java
cndescription: 到目前为止，Java 一直被忽视，因为 WebAssembly 模块更有利于 C 和 C++、Rust 和 Go，现在甚至 Python 也被嵌入为解释器。
